item.title: About
item.description: Hello I’m Lion! I’m currently working on Witchbrook as a programmer at Chucklefish in London. I’ve started my programming journey back when I was twelve years old with writing little mods for Minecraft. After I’ve noticed how much I enjoyed programming I started to learn C++ and attended the Games Academy in Frankfurt. One year before my graduation I landed a job at Ubisoft Mainz in november 2017 and then moved over to Ubisoft DÃ¼sseldorf in november 2018.
